name: Climb the Cosmos
description:
Hey!

Climb the Cosmos is a game created for the 9th ScoreSpace Game Jam and with the theme of 'Climbing!' Jump, shoot, dodge enemies, and collect coins to increase your score and shoot for a highscore!

This game has infinite gameplay with a variety of hazards, enemies, and items to encounter, and is a great game to play against your friends to see who can get the highest score!

I love and always appreciate any feedback, so please leave any ideas in the comments! Thanks everyone for playing my game! :D
